metadata.title: CVE-2021-38297 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Go before 1.16.9 and 1.17.x before 1.17.2 has a Buffer Overflow via largearguments in a function invocation from a WASM module, when GOARCH=wasmGOOS=js is used.

criterions.comment: golang-1.8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
